launch_landsat_explorer: __Launch the Landsat Explorer in a new tab
launch_sentinel_1_explorer: __Launch the Sentinel-1 Explorer in a new tab
launch_sentinel_2_explorer: __Launch the Sentinel-2 Explorer in a new tab
launch_landcover_explorer: __Launch the Sentinel-2 Land Cover Explorer in a new tab
add_scenes_to_list: __Add scenes to this list to create a chronological animation.
compare_and_report_changes: __Compare and report changes between two selected images. Change is always calculated and reported chronologically from oldest to newest.
complete_check_browser_downloads: __Complete! Check browser downloads for the MP4 file.
select_two_scenes: __Select two scenes, SCENE A and SCENE B, and then click VIEW CHANGE.
dynamic_view_instruction: __To select an individual scene for a specific date, try the FIND A SCENE mode.
something_went_wrong: __Something went wrong and the app has crashed.
app_temporarily_unavailable: __This app is temporarily unavailable due to an issue fetching data from one of the data services.
click_to_copy_coordinates: __Click to copy the coordinates of this location
mask_tool_tooltip: __Spectral reflectance values can be used to compute a variety of indices. Different thresholds can be applied to these spectral indices to mask and highlight different characteristics of the Earth's surface.
clipping_mask_info: __Show selected index pixels as a clipping mask, rather than as a solid color.
select_scene_to_calculate_mask: __Select a scene to calculate a mask for the selected index.
select_scene_and_click_location: __Select a scene and click a location within that scene to generate a temporal profile for the selected category.
select_scene_sepctral_profile: __Select a scene and click on the map to identify the spectral profile for the point of interest.
spectral_profile_info: __The spectral reflectance of different materials on the Earth's surface is variable. Spectral profiles can be used to identify different land cover types.
save_map_view_as_image: __Save this map view as an image
select_acquisition_date: __Select an acquisition date in Calendar to find a scene.
scenes_displayed_based_on_intersection: __Scenes are displayed based on their intersection with the map's center.
submitting_raster_analysis_job: __Submitting the raster analysis job. Please do not close the browser tab.
title: __Title
name_already_exists: __This name already exists. Please choose a unique name.
text_too_long: __The text is too long. Please keep it under {{maxLength}} characters.
estimated_cost: __The estimated cost of this task is {{estimatedCost}} credits.
dialog_can_be_closed: __This dialog can safely be closed while request is processed.
publish_scene_description: __Publish a hosted imagery layer of the current index mask. This action requires a Professional or above User Type and a Publisher role or higher.
publish_index_mask_description: __Publish a hosted imagery layer of the current change detection output. This action requires a Professional or above User Type and a Publisher role or higher.
publish_change_detection_description: __Publish a hosted imagery layer of the current change detection output. This action requires a Professional or above User Type and a Publisher role or higher.
publish_web_app_description: __Create an instance of this application in its current state as an ArcGIS Online web application.
publish_webmap_description: __Create an ArcGIS Online map containing the selected scene as a layer.
publish_multi_layers_webmap_description: __Create an ArcGIS Online map with individual layers per scene.
publish_single_layer_webmap_description: __Create an ArcGIS Online map with a single layer with multiple scenes.
name: __Name
interetsing_places_data_source: __Information contained in the Interesting Places descriptions was sourced from Wikipedia.
